nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: This Cyber Tower is full of dangers, and you have to use some cool things to protect yourself, like passwords, MFAs, and phishing detectors. Do you know anything about these?

options.text: Yes, I am ready, just let me go

nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: Don't worry, we have amazing trainers to help you learn everything. See these rooms? There's a mentor waiting for you in each room. Go visit them!

nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: Very well. But before you start, you see there are several mentors are waiting for you in these rooms. Go visit them first to obtain the key to the upper levels of the tower!

nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: Very well. Come and take this key. They are waiting for you.

nodes.speaker: Mentor
nodes.text: Good luck. The tower is watching.

reward.message: (Mentor hands you a gleaming green key.)
